name: Mondstadt Rug: Crimson Ardor
description: A rug with the emblem of the Knights of Favonius on it. The red dye is taken from Valberries.\nThe quality of the fabric is also quite unique, and is said to be impermeable to elemental energies, fearing neither Pyro's heat nor Cryo's frost.\nStill, given the cost of these carpets, it might be best not to put such unsubstantiated rumors to the test...
